Daily oral dose furosemide ≥ 40 mg ≤ 240 mg ( equivalent ) Identified within 24 hour hospital admission Heart failure define least 1 symptom ( dyspnea , orthopnea , edema ) AND 1 sign ( rales auscultation , peripheral edema , ascites , pulmonary vascular congestion chest radiography ) Anticipated need IV loop diuretic least 48 hour Likely require daily net urine output range 13 L/day 7296 hour time period .
